name: Treasure Hunt (in my strange world!)
description:
This game is called "Treasure hunt in my weird world". You already know what it's about.

One day you receive a suspicious email. And your life changes. Kind of. I guess.  Explore a weird world, meet assorted weird guys and find weird treasures (that's all). 

I honestly don't know why I made this game, but it was fun. Hope you'll also enjoy it! It's point-and-click-esque, but you cannot actually point or click, you use arrows to move yada yada just play it already

Not suitable for children and contains a couple of strong words.
